short_description: jordan select tours & dmc is a tour operator based in amman, jordan.
long_description: founded in 1994, jordan select tours is an independent destination management company (dmc), tour operator and travel agency. we offer spectacular, tailor-made tours and experiences in jordan at incredible value. we are highly experienced in dealing with both corporate groups and private parties. our trips are created with flexibility in mind, and we ensure that clients have enough time to both relax and explore. in business for over twenty five years, we have built an accomplished team, well accustomed to meeting diverse requirements. we always aim to exceed expectations, and our network of expert guides and drivers enable us to do so. always proficient in english and other languages, they bring out the best in destinations, enabling our clients to fully appreciate jordan's attractions. jordan is a water scarce country, increasingly vulnerable to the effects of climate change. whilst travel is an industry associated with environmental costs, we work hard to reduce our impact. 2021 is a special year for us, as we celebrate two decades of our ambitious reforestation initiative in jordan's north. we are proud to operate sustainably and view it as a key differentiator between us and our competitors. travelling with us is to choose experience and quality. marked by past civilisations and inhabited by a people famed for their hospitality and friendliness, the time to experience jordan is now.
business_tags: private parties | travel arrangements | tailor made tours | destination management companies | travel agency services | leisure & tourism

long_description: jordan select tours is an independent professional destination management company (dmc), jordan tour operator and conference organiser founded in 1994. our travel company's mission is to provide every client with the best product and service possible, combined with professionalism, integrity and value, in a framework of responsible tourism. through our long history, we have earned the trust of our clients by offering them quality services, honest advice and the support they require in jordan. independent tours â€” private, tailor-made tours of jordan. we can offer you some of the most creative, best valued, tailor-made tours in jordan. we strive to understand your travel requirements and demonstrate our love for our country by showing it to you in its true and authentic state. jordan continues to excite its visitors, offering them insights into its rich history and incredible natural and manmade wonders. come and discover it with us on this private tour, which exposes jordan's riches from north to south.
